channel.title: Bonus days
channel.description:
Well everyone loves the bots getting banned. Yet no one is talking about the bonuses xD
Anyways I'm doing a bonus log For everyday from today until friday.
Tuesday, I clearly didn't do shit, all i did was almost level my slayer to 52.
Wednesday (10/26/2011) Today it's the castle ways 3x ticket day, So I guess I'm oging to play my favourite mini game of all time!
Here's some pics: [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/1292/0018548964274add8ba4655.png[/img] [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/3747/b2f5e9c879f541f18b3e824.png[/img] [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/19/d3f5372ce55142d8ba4a0f3.png[/img] [img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/4777/25572907133d4a53afe5837.png[/img] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/8995/cd9249c669ea40b8ad8ea6a.png[/img] [img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/1315/23354d8566794db8a20d33d.png[/img] [img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/8909/e4a24a609e1b4784b4a1ced.png[/img]

item.title: Bonus days
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:419648”]I’m sure some of you have heard my story of playing c wars with zezima. We were both on zammy, an zammy won because the entire other team piled him for the right to say “I killed zezima”. This was about 06, maybe early 07.

Castle wars has and will be my favorite minigame. To bad they changed the reward armor.[/quote]
Yeah reward armor was good… think I played a game once with Zezima without realizing it lol

Read full topic
